Rulings.HAT:
● If "Dimensional Fissure" is applying, this card's ① cannot be activated.
● You can't activate this card's ② during the first turn of the Duel or in your Main Phase 2.
● If you discard an "Atlantean" monster to Summon this card, that "Atlantean" monster's effect must be Chain Link 1, as it was sent to the GY before this card was Summoned. 
Afterwards, this card's effect to search will be Chain Link 2.

Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] Trigger effects who "trigger" during a chain do not add to a chain that is being built. They wait until the current chain resolves, then start a new chain. So 'Atlantean' monsters discarded to activate "Mermail Abyssmegalo" will not chain to "Mermail Abyssmegalo" and will instead start a new chain after its effect resolves.
